title: Matching (1 point each)
instructions: Select the correct answer from the dropdown.

prompts.question: Creates a local copy of a remote repository on your machine. This is typically done only once per repository.
A ___ is an independent company that develops games but does not publish them, often meaning they get less of the profits.
Actual cost of physical materials needed to make up the full retail box and contents.
Sells the products based off MSRP and handles returns.
Celebrity VO, Streamers/YouTubers, and Events are all examples of this.
